text: Great salary, benefits and a lot of great people to work with. Unfortunately they don't seem to want to invest in most staff members (internal) for promotional opportunities. Overall, I am very thankful for my position and hope to experience other opportunities in the future.

Working for the city of Halifax was the best job I have ever had. It was hard to get full time permanent work so I did term positions within the city. I learned a lot , was dedicated to my work, never missed work and just enjoyed everything I did. Makes it easier to go to work everyday when you enjoy what you do.
